title: Thermajohn Long Johns for Men, Thermal Underwear for Men Long Underwear Mens Leggings Thermal Pants Men Cold Weather Bottoms
description: Heat Retention: When it comes to warmth and everyday wear, these mens thermal pants are designed specifically for you to stay protected from the cold.
Ultra Soft Fleece: Designed with a fleece lining & quality material, these ultra soft long johns for men will keep you feeling comfortable throughout the day.
Moisture Wicking: Stay dry with these long underwear mens as they're made from breathable fabric that effectively wicks away moisture and perspiration.
4 Way Stretch: Made with stretchable material, these thermal pants men allows you freedom of movement with no chafing or bunching up when you move.
Layer Up: Layering is essential to ward off the cold, so bundle up with a pair of mens leggings for cold weather this winter and stay comfortable while outside or in bed as a pajama.
